ing: 1 (46 fluid ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail
des: "Any person can make this savory soup with vegetable juice cocktail, potatoes and onion. Use frozen or canned mixed vegetables."
ins: In a large saucepan or stockpot, brown and drain ground beef. Add juice, onion, potatoes, and mixed vegetables. Bring to a boil and let simmer until potatoes are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
